title: FS:  Graded HOFers and 1 Raw Elite 11

posts.post_title: FS:  Graded HOFers and 1 Raw Elite 11
posts.post_content:
I am consolidating some prior sales threads into one and updating with lower prices on the remaining cards.

All prices assume PayPal FF or zero cost payment method.  Please add 3% for Goods and Services.  All prices include delivery.  I will discount further if buying multiple cards.  

Please message or email me with any questions at [url]frankbev29@yahoo.com[/url].


McGraw with Cap PSA 2(MK) = $175
Flick Sovereign 150 SGC 1 (PSA only has 7 graded with this back) = $SOLD
Marquard Old Mill SGC 2 (PSA only has 8 graded with this back) = $500
Bresnahan Pied 150 SGC Authentic = $95

Shaw Sovereign Raw = $70
Bumped to remove sold cards and price drop on remaining.  Open to offers as well,
